Or both?\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-1[0].Since Last Contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-2[0].Since Last Contact} = true\",\"choices\":[{\"value\":\"1\",\"text\":\"Completely to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others\"},{\"value\":\"2\",\"text\":\"Mostly to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others\"},{\"value\":\"3\",\"text\":\"Equally to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others and to end/stop the pain\"},{\"value\":\"4\",\"text\":\"Mostly to end or stop the pain (you couldn't go on living with the pain or how you were feeling)\"},{\"value\":\"5\",\"text\":\"Completely to end or stop the pain (you couldn't go on living with the pain or how you were feeling)\"},{\"value\":\"0\",\"text\":\"Does not apply\"}]}],\"visible\":false,\"visibleIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-1[0].Since Last Contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-2[0].Since Last Contact} = true\",\"title\":\"Intensity of Ideation\"},{\"type\":\"panel\",\"name\":\"behavior-panel\",\"elements\":[{\"type\":\"matrixdynamic\",\"name\":\"c-ssrs-slc-actual-attempt\",\"title\":\"Actual Attempt\",\"description\":\"A potentially self-injurious act committed with at least some wish to die, as a result of act. Behavior was in part thought of as method to kill oneself. Intent does not have to be 100%.  If there is any intent/desire to die associated with the act, then it can be considered an actual suicide attempt. There does not have to be any injury or harm, just the potential for injury or harm. If person pulls trigger while gun is in mouth but gun is broken so no injury results, this is considered an attempt.  Inferring Intent: Even if an individual denies intent/wish to die, it may be inferred clinically from the behavior or circumstances. For example, a highly lethal act that is clearly not an accident so no other intent but suicide can be inferred (e.g., gunshot to head, jumping from window of a high floor/story). Also, if someone denies intent to die, but they thought that what they did could be lethal, intent may be inferred. 'Have you made a suicide attempt? Have you done anything to harm yourself? Have you done anything dangerous where you could have died? What did you do? Did you______ as a way to end your life? Did you want to die (even a little) when you_____? Were you trying to end your life when you _____? Or did you think it was possible you could have died from_____? Or did you do it purely for other reasons / without ANY intention of killing yourself (like to relieve stress, feel better, get sympathy, or get something else to happen)? (Self-Injurious Behavior without suicidal intent)'\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"columns\":[{\"name\":\"Since last contact\",\"isRequired\":true},{\"name\":\"Number since last contact\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-actual-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\",\"inputType\":\"number\",\"min\":0},{\"name\":\"Describe\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-actual-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\"}],\"columnLayout\":\"vertical\",\"choices\":[1,2,3,4,5],\"cellType\":\"boolean\",\"allowAddRows\":false,\"allowRemoveRows\":false,\"rowCount\":1},{\"type\":\"boolean\",\"name\":\"c-ssrs-slc-non-suicidal-self-injury\",\"title\":\"Has subject engaged in Non-Suicidal Self-Injurious Behavior?\",\"titleLocation\":\"left\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"isRequired\":true},{\"type\":\"matrixdynamic\",\"name\":\"c-ssrs-slc-interrupted-attempt\",\"title\":\"Interrupted attempt\",\"description\":\"When the person is interrupted (by an outside circumstance) from starting the potentially self-injurious act (if not for that, actual attempt would have occurred). Overdose: Person has pills in hand but is stopped from ingesting.  Once they ingest any pills, this becomes an attempt rather than an interrupted attempt. Shooting: Person has gun pointed toward self, gun is taken away by someone else, or is somehow prevented from pulling trigger. Once they pull the trigger, even if the gun fails to fire, it is an attempt. Jumping: Person is poised to jump, is grabbed and taken down from ledge. Hanging: Person has noose around neck but has not yet started to hang - is stopped from doing so. 'Has there been a time when you started to do something to end your life but someone or something stopped you before you actually did anything?'\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"columns\":[{\"name\":\"Since last contact\",\"isRequired\":true},{\"name\":\"Number since last contact\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-interrupted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\",\"inputType\":\"number\",\"min\":0},{\"name\":\"Describe\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-interrupted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\"}],\"columnLayout\":\"vertical\",\"choices\":[1,2,3,4,5],\"cellType\":\"boolean\",\"allowAddRows\":false,\"allowRemoveRows\":false,\"rowCount\":1},{\"type\":\"matrixdynamic\",\"name\":\"c-ssrs-slc-aborted-attempt\",\"title\":\"Aborted or self-interrupted attempt\",\"description\":\"When person begins to take steps toward making a suicide attempt, but stops themselves before they actually have engaged in any self-destructive behavior. Examples are similar to interrupted attempts, except that the individual stops him/herself, instead of being stopped by something else. 'Has there been a time when you started to do something to try to end your life but you stopped yourself before you actually did anything?'\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"columns\":[{\"name\":\"Since last contact\",\"isRequired\":true},{\"name\":\"Number since last contact\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-aborted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\",\"inputType\":\"number\",\"min\":0},{\"name\":\"Describe\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-aborted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\"}],\"columnLayout\":\"vertical\",\"choices\":[1,2,3,4,5],\"cellType\":\"boolean\",\"allowAddRows\":false,\"allowRemoveRows\":false,\"rowCount\":1},{\"type\":\"matrixdynamic\",\"name\":\"c-ssrs-slc-preparatory-acts\",\"title\":\"Preparatory acts or behavior\",\"description\":\"Acts or preparation towards imminently making a suicide attempt. This can include anything beyond a verbalization or thought, such as assembling a specific method (e.g., buying pills, purchasing a gun) or preparing for one’s death by suicide (e.g., giving things away, writing a suicide note). 'Have you taken any steps towards making a suicide attempt or preparing to kill yourself (such as collecting pills, getting a gun, giving valuables away or writing a suicide note)?'\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"columns\":[{\"name\":\"Since last contact\",\"isRequired\":true},{\"name\":\"Number since last contact\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-preparatory-acts[0].Since last contact} = true\",\"inputType\":\"number\",\"min\":0},{\"name\":\"Describe\",\"cellType\":\"text\",\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-preparatory-acts[0].Since last contact} = true\"}],\"columnLayout\":\"vertical\",\"choices\":[1,2,3,4,5],\"cellType\":\"boolean\",\"allowAddRows\":false,\"allowRemoveRows\":false,\"rowCount\":1},{\"type\":\"dropdown\",\"name\":\"c-ssrs-slc-actualy-lethality\",\"visible\":false,\"visibleIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-actual-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-interrupted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-preparatory-acts[0].Since last contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-aborted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\",\"title\":\"Actual Lethality/Medical Damage\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-actual-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-interrupted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-preparatory-acts[0].Since last contact} = true or {c-ssrs-slc-aborted-attempt[0].Since last contact} = true\",\"choices\":[{\"value\":\"0\",\"text\":\"No physical damage or very minor physical damage (e.g., surface scratches)\"},{\"value\":\"1\",\"text\":\"Minor physical damage (e.g., lethargic speech; first-degree burns; mild bleeding; sprains) \"},{\"value\":\"2\",\"text\":\"Moderate physical damage; medical attention needed (e.g., conscious but sleepy, somewhat responsive; second-degree burns; bleeding of major vessel)\"},{\"value\":\"3\",\"text\":\"Moderately severe physical damage; medical hospitalization and likely intensive care required (e.g., comatose with reflexes intact; third-degree burns less than 20% of body; extensive blood loss but can recover; major fractures)\"},{\"value\":\"4\",\"text\":\"Severe physical damage; medical hospitalization with intensive care required (e.g., comatose without reflexes; third-degree burns over 20% of body; extensive blood loss with unstable vital signs; major damage to a vital area)\"},{\"value\":\"5\",\"text\":\"Death\"}]},{\"type\":\"dropdown\",\"name\":\"c-ssrs-slc-potential-lethality\",\"visible\":false,\"visibleIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-actualy-lethality} = 0\",\"title\":\"Potential Lethality\",\"description\":\"Likely lethality of actual attempt if no medical damage (the following examples, while having no actual medical damage, had potential for very serious lethality: put gun in mouth and pulled the trigger but gun fails to fire so no medical damage; laying on train tracks with oncoming train but pulled away before run over).\",\"hideNumber\":true,\"requiredIf\":\"{c-ssrs-slc-actualy-lethality} = 0\",\"choices\":[{\"value\":\"0\",\"text\":\"Behavior not likely to result in injury\"},{\"value\":\"1\",\"text\":\"Behavior likely to result in injury but not likely to cause death\"},{\"value\":\"2\",\"text\":\"Behavior likely to result in death despite available medical care\"}]}],\"title\":\"Suicidal Behavior\"}],\"title\":\"C-SSRS - Since Last Contact\"}],\"showTitle\":false}",

"definition": "{\"title\":\"Admissions NPS\",\"logoPosition\":\"right\",\"pages\":[{\"name\":\"page1\",\"elements\":[{\"type\":\"radiogroup\",\"name\":\"admissions-nps1\",\"title\":\"Overall, how would you rate your experience with Admissions at Equip?\",\"isRequired\":true,\"choices\":[\"Very dissatisfied\",\"Moderately dissatisfied\",\"Somewhat dissatisfied\",\"Somewhat satisfied\",\"Moderately satisfied\",\"Very satisfied\"]},{\"type\":\"dropdown\",\"name\":\"admissions-nps2\",\"title\":\"How did you first hear about Equip?\",\"isRequired\":true,\"choices\":[\"News article\",\"From a friend\",\"From a clinic, center or provider\",\"Online search (e.g., Google, Yahoo!, Bing)\",\"Online forum/discussion board/Facebook group\",\"Social media (e.g., Facebook, Instagram)\"],\"showOtherItem\":true,\"otherText\":\"Other (please specify)\"},{\"type\":\"radiogroup\",\"name\":\"admissions-nps3\",\"title\":\"After going through Equip's Admissions process, how confident are you that your loved one will recover from their eating disorder?\",\"isRequired\":true,\"choices\":[\"Very pessimistic\",\"Moderately pessimistic\",\"Somewhat pessimistic\",\"Somewhat optimistic\",\"Moderately optimistic\",\"Very optimistic\"]},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"admissions-nps4\",\"title\":\"On a scale of 0-10, how likely are you to recommend Equip to a family seeking eating disorder treatment?\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":10}],\"title\":\"Admissions Satisfaction Survey\",\"description\":\"Choosing treatment for your loved one can be a long, confusing, and difficult process. Please select a number on the line below how much sensitivity to taste has affected your child’s eating, ranging from 0 (= no negative effect/no particular sensitivity to taste) to 6 (= extremely negative effect, for example, leading to refusal to eat many foods, sticking only to a limited number of preferred foods, or extreme caution when eating )\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent22\",\"title\":\"Over the past month has your child been particularly sensitive to the texture or consistency of food, which has put them off eating any foods or trying any new foods (for example, does your child stick to foods of a certain texture only or have they had difficulty eating foods that have different textures mixed together such as pasta with sauce or sandwiches)? Please select a number on the line below how much sensitivity to texture or consistency has affected your child’s eating, ranging from 0 (= no negative effect/no particular sensitivity) to 6 (=extremely negative effect, for example, leading to refusal to eat many foods, sticking only to a limited number of preferred foods, or extreme caution when eating)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent23\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, has your child been particularly sensitive to the appearance of food, which has put them off eating any foods or trying any new foods (for example, if food does not look right, such as burnt ends of chips/fries, broken biscuits/cookies, or being the wrong colour)? Please select a number on the line below how much sensitivity to the appearance of food has affected your child’s eating, ranging from 0 (= no negative effect/no particular sensitivity) to 6(=extremely negative effect, for example, leading to refusal to eat many foods, sticking only to a limited number of preferred foods, or extreme caution when eating)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent24\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, how often has your child forgotten to eat or found it difficult to make time to eat? Please select a number on the line below how often your child has forgotten to eat or found it difficult to make time to eat, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent25\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, how often has your child appeared to lack enjoyment in food or eating (even if only certain foods)? Please select a number on the line below how often your child has lacked enjoyment in food or eating, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent26\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, how often has your child said or indicated they are full before their meal is finished, or stopped eating sooner than others because they had had enough? Please select a number on the line below how often your child has indicated they are full or stopped eating early, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent27\",\"title\":\"Over the past month has your child been avoiding or restricting the amount or type of food they eat, because they have said or indicated they were afraid that something bad might happen, like being sick, choking, having an allergic reaction, or being in pain? Please select a number on the line below how often being afraid something bad might happen has affected your child’s eating, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent28\",\"title\":\"Over the past month has your child avoided eating situations because they said or indicated they were worried something bad might happen, like being sick, choking, having an allergic reaction, or being in pain while eating (for example, because they might be served something they usually avoid for these reasons, or because they have had a bad experience in the past)? Please select a number on the line below how often your child has avoided eating situations due to such worries, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqparent29\",\"title\":\"Over the past month has your child expressed any physical feelings of panic or anxiety (examples might include a racing heart, sweaty palms, feeling sick) when they have seen something that has made them think something bad might happen, like being sick, choking, having an allergic reaction, or being in pain while eating? Please select a number on the line below how often your child had had physical feelings of panic or anxiety due to such thoughts, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6}],\"title\":\"The following questions are about your child’s eating – some ask about how things currently are, others ask about things over the past month or the past 3 months. Please tick the boxes that apply, or enter the information requested.\",\"description\":\"Please read each question carefully. Please answer all the questions. Thank you.\"}],\"showTitle\":false}",

Please select a number on the line below how much sensitivity to texture or consistency has affected your eating, ranging from 0 (= no negative effect/no particular sensitivity) to 6 (=extremely negative effect, for example, leading to refusal to eat many foods, sticking only to a limited number of preferred foods, or extreme caution when eating)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqself23\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, have you been particularly sensitive to the appearance of food, which has put you off eating any foods or trying any new foods (for example, if food does not look right, such as burnt ends of chips/fries, broken biscuits/cookies, or being the wrong colour)? Please select a number on the line below how much sensitivity to the appearance of food has affected your eating, ranging from 0 (= no negative effect/no particular sensitivity) to 6 (=extremely negative effect, for example, leading to refusal to eat many foods, sticking only to a limited number of preferred foods, or extreme caution when eating)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqself24\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, how often have you forgotten to eat or found it difficult to make time to eat? Please select a number of the line below how often you have forgotten to eat or found it difficult to make time to eat, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqself25\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, how often have you lacked enjoyment in food or eating (even if only certain foods)? Please select a number on the line below how often you have lacked enjoyment in food or eating, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqself26\",\"title\":\"Over the past month, how often have you felt full before your meal is finished, or stopped eating sooner than others because you had had enough? Please select a number on the line below how often you have felt full or stopped eating early, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqself27\",\"title\":\"Over the past month have you been avoiding or restricting the amount or type of food you eat, because you were afraid that something bad might happen, like being sick, choking, having an allergic reaction, or being in pain? Please select a number on the line below how often being afraid something bad might happen has affected your eating, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqself28\",\"title\":\"Over the past month have you avoided eating situations because you were worried something bad might happen, like being sick, choking, having an allergic reaction, or being in pain while eating (for example, because you might be served something you usually avoid for these reasons, or because you have had a bad experience in the past)? Please circle a number on the line below how often you have avoided eating situations due to such worries, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6},{\"type\":\"rating\",\"name\":\"pardiarqself29\",\"title\":\"Over the past month have you had any physical feelings of panic or anxiety (examples might include a racing heart, sweaty palms, feeling sick) when you have seen something that has made you think something bad might happen, like being sick, choking, having an allergic reaction, or being in pain while eating? Please circle a number on the line below how often you have had physical feelings of panic or anxiety due to such thoughts, ranging from 0 (= never) to 6 (=always)\",\"isRequired\":true,\"rateMin\":0,\"rateMax\":6}],\"title\":\"The following questions are about your eating – some ask about how things currently are, others ask about things over the past month or the past 3 months. Please tick the boxes that apply to you, or enter the information requested.\",\"description\":\"Please read each question carefully. Please answer all the questions. Thank you.\"}]}",

If person pulls trigger while gun is in mouth but gun is broken so no injury results, this is considered an attempt.  Inferring Intent: Even if an individual denies intent/wish to die, it may be inferred clinically from the behavior or circumstances. For example, a highly lethal act that is clearly not an accident so no other intent but suicide can be inferred (e.g., gunshot to head, jumping from window of a high floor/story).
